archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.8.4: When third parties install or update software for an organisation, any physical or logical access should only be granted for the duration required, subject to appropriate authorisation and monitoring of activities.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
